includedAssets.title: Welcome To Briarcliff
includedAssets.synopsis: In 2012, a couple visit a former asylum. In 1964, a suspected killer is committed there. Series two of the award-winning drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In 2012, a couple visit a former asylum. In 1964, a suspected killer is committed there. Series two of the award-winning drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In 2012, a couple visit a former asylum. In 1964, a suspected killer is committed there. Series two of the award-winning drama.

includedAssets.title: Tricks And Treats
includedAssets.synopsis: In both 1964 and the present, a serial killer is on the loose. Briarcliff calls in an exorcist to save a patient beyond medical help.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In both 1964 and the present, a serial killer is on the loose. Briarcliff calls in an exorcist to save a patient beyond medical help.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In both 1964 and the present, a serial killer is on the loose. Briarcliff calls in an exorcist to save a patient beyond medical help.

includedAssets.title: Nor'easter
includedAssets.synopsis: A group of Briarcliff patients plan an escape attempt, using an impending storm as cover.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A group of Briarcliff patients plan an escape attempt, using an impending storm as cover.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A group of Briarcliff patients plan an escape attempt, using an impending storm as cover.

includedAssets.title: I Am Anne Frank: Part 1
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep4 - I Am Anne Frank: Part 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A new patient arrives at Briarcliff claiming to be Anne Frank and bringing revelations about Dr Arden's past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A new patient arrives at Briarcliff claiming to be Anne Frank and bringing revelations about Dr Arden's past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A new patient arrives at Briarcliff claiming to be Anne Frank and bringing revelations about Dr Arden's past.

includedAssets.title: I Am Anne Frank: Part 2
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep5 - I Am Anne Frank: Part 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Sister Jude tries to investigate Dr Arden, who pushes to perform brain surgery on 'Anne Frank'.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sister Jude tries to investigate Dr Arden, who pushes to perform brain surgery on 'Anne Frank'.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sister Jude tries to investigate Dr Arden, who pushes to perform brain surgery on 'Anne Frank'.

includedAssets.title: The Origins of Monstrosity
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep6 - The Origins of Monstrosity
includedAssets.synopsis: Dr Arden forms a pact with the Monsignor, and Lana discovers more about Bloody Face's past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dr Arden forms a pact with the Monsignor, and Lana discovers more about Bloody Face's past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dr Arden forms a pact with the Monsignor, and Lana discovers more about Bloody Face's past.

includedAssets.title: Dark Cousin
includedAssets.synopsis: The Angel of Death arrives at Briarcliff, and Kit makes a desperate attempt to be reunited with Grace.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Angel of Death arrives at Briarcliff, and Kit makes a desperate attempt to be reunited with Grace.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Angel of Death arrives at Briarcliff, and Kit makes a desperate attempt to be reunited with Grace.

includedAssets.title: Unholy Night
includedAssets.synopsis: Dr Arden has a startling encounter at the Death Chute, while a murderous Santa causes trouble at Briarcliff.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dr Arden has a startling encounter at the Death Chute, while a murderous Santa causes trouble at Briarcliff.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dr Arden has a startling encounter at the Death Chute, while a murderous Santa causes trouble at Briarcliff.

includedAssets.title: The Coat Hanger
includedAssets.synopsis: Lana attempts to fully exonerate Kit, Arden is witness to an incredible return and the Monsignor receives an unlikely convert.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lana attempts to fully exonerate Kit, Arden is witness to an incredible return and the Monsignor receives an unlikely convert.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lana attempts to fully exonerate Kit, Arden is witness to an incredible return and the Monsignor receives an unlikely convert.

includedAssets.title: The Name Game
includedAssets.synopsis: Dr Thredson shares dark secrets with Kit, and Arden's experiments come to a dramatic conclusion.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dr Thredson shares dark secrets with Kit, and Arden's experiments come to a dramatic conclusion.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dr Thredson shares dark secrets with Kit, and Arden's experiments come to a dramatic conclusion.

includedAssets.title: Spilt Milk
includedAssets.synopsis: Lana confronts Dr Thredson as Kit receives some devastating news. Jude clashes with the Monsignor.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lana confronts Dr Thredson as Kit receives some devastating news. Jude clashes with the Monsignor.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lana confronts Dr Thredson as Kit receives some devastating news. Jude clashes with the Monsignor.

includedAssets.title: Continuum
includedAssets.synopsis: Kit attempts to adapt to his new family life as Grace's obsession takes a violent turn. Sister Jude is given a terrifying new roommate.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Kit attempts to adapt to his new family life as Grace's obsession takes a violent turn. Sister Jude is given a terrifying new roommate.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Kit attempts to adapt to his new family life as Grace's obsession takes a violent turn. Sister Jude is given a terrifying new roommate.

includedAssets.title: Madness Ends
includedAssets.synopsis: Lana attempts to free Sister Jude and finally shut down the asylum. Johnny sets out to avenge his father.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lana attempts to free Sister Jude and finally shut down the asylum. Johnny sets out to avenge his father.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lana attempts to free Sister Jude and finally shut down the asylum. Johnny sets out to avenge his father.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Second season of the award-winning horror drama, following the staff and patients at a 1960s insane asylum. Starring Zachary Quinto, Joseph Fiennes, Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, James Cromwell and Jessica Lange.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Season two of the award-winning drama, following the inhabitants of a 1960s insane asylum. Starring Zachary Quinto, Sarah Paulson and Evan Peters.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Second season of the award-winning horror drama, following the staff and patients at a 1960s insane asylum. Starring Zachary Quinto, Joseph Fiennes, Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, James Cromwell and Jessica Lange.

includedIn.title: American Horror Story
includedIn.synopsis: An award-winning ensemble including Jessica Lange, Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters and Lady Gaga play an ever-changing cast of characters in this superbly creepy anthology series from Nip/Tuck and Glee creator Ryan Murphy. With settings ranging from a freak show to a haunted house, the stories may change from season to season, but the scares are ever-present.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: With settings ranging from a hotel to a coven, the stories in this anthology series may change from season to season, but the scares are ever-present.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: An award-winning ensemble including Jessica Lange, Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters and Lady Gaga play an ever-changing cast of characters in this superbly creepy anthology series from Nip/Tuck and Glee creator Ryan Murphy. With settings ranging from a freak show to a haunted house, the stories may change from season to season, but the scares are ever-present.
